item.title: Asociación de Biólogos del Quindío
item.description: Functions performed Management of the association’s financial resources through the bank account, ensuring the normal collection of ordinary and extraordinary accounts, as well as making the different payments that the Association must make and that are previously ordered by the president, the Board of Directors or the assembly

item.title: Asociación de Biólogos del Quindío
item.description: Functions performed Carry the legal representation of the Association, before public or private entities, in all the acts in which it intervenes, in addition to executing all the mandates of the Assembly and the Board of Directors

item.title: Biotica Consultores - Universidad de Santander
item.description: Functions performed Develop a methodological proposal for the characterization of beetle communities.

item.title: Civil Service S.A.S.
item.description: Functions performed Collection of primary information in the field, following the guidelines given by the technical coordinator.

item.title: Instituto de Recursos Biológicos Alexander von Humboldt
item.description: Functions performed Carry out sampling activities of beetle beetles and melolontid larvae.

item.title: Instituto de Recursos Biológicos Alexander von Humboldt
item.description: Functions performed Carry out sampling activities of beetle beetles and melolontid larvae.

item.title: Universidad de Santander
item.description: Functions performed Curatorship of the reference collection of beetles (Coleoptera: Scarabaeinae), Lepidoptera (butterflies) and Hymenoptera (Bees) to be delivered to Agrosavia under the guidelines of the collection of biological specimens.
